abilities.name: Healing Kick
abilities.description: Deals 200% Physical Damage to ALL enemies.

abilities.name: Sprout Planting
abilities.description: Plants a healing sprout on an ally for 2 turns. When the sprout expires, it heals the target for 1250 (+100% Healing Power) HP.

abilities.name: Pushback Attack
abilities.description: Deals 150% physical damage to the target and has an 40% chance to stun it for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Spirits Strength
abilities.description: Heals ALL allies for 1200 (+200% Magical Damage) HP. Cooldown reduced by 1 whenever Julia is healed.

passive.name: Healing Empowerment
passive.description: Whenever Julia heals herself (including lifesteal) or heals an ally, she permanently gains +5 Physical Damage.
